mapper.select: SELECT s.device_number, date_format(max(s.measure_time),'%Y-%m-%d-%T') AS measure_time, date_format(MAX(e.update_time),'%Y-%m-%d-%T') AS update_time, CASE WHEN date_format(MAX(e.update_time),'%m-%d %l%i') = date_format(now(),'%m-%d %l%i') THEN 'Danger' ELSE 'Safe' END AS alarm FROM rrps.mb_sensor s LEFT JOIN rrps.mb_event e ON s.device_number = e.device_number GROUP BY s.device_number ORDER BY s.device_number
